name: ConnectCV
tag_list: online-resumes, cv, cover-letters, resumes, reverse-recuiting, recruiting, career-management
overview:
ConnectCV and you

ConnectCV is a free online platform that, through an innovative range of web-based career tools, allows job seekers of all levels and careers to harness the true power of the internet to achieve their career goals. Easy to use online resume wizard will have your resume ready in no time.

The ConnectCV career management platform enables you to manage your online resumes, connect to employers, verify your degrees and educational certificates, fire off a professional job application in seconds using your pre-formatted application email and cover letter and much more.

ConnectCV and employers

Growing numbers of employers are recognising the benefits of communicating seamlessly with candidates via their live online resumes. The days of fiddling around with a word document, or even worse, filling in one of those clunky online job applications are numbered. Wherever you see the “share your resume” link on a company website or job advert, you’ll know that connecting with a job opportunity is no more than a few mouse clicks away.

ConnectCV and other third party career/alumni/professional websites

Your ConnectCV resume is powered by iDlogik, which means that you don’t need to be at ConnectCV.com to access your resume. When visiting any other iDlogik powered career, alumni, or professional association website, you can simply log into your account in exactly the same way you would if you were at ConnectCV.com. So wherever you see the ‘powered by iDlogik’ icon, you can rest assured that you and the host website are on the same page.

Founded in Sydney, Australia in 2010 with the sole aim of providing jobseekers with the world’s most innovative online career management tools, ConnectCV continues to grow at a rapid rate with a user-base that spans the globe. less
